text.custom: Somewhere totally different. I don’t even know where I am right now. I just grabbed this artifact then suddenly I was here!
Oooooo I’ve seen one of those before. The dolphins found a stone like yours a few years ago.
Wait they found one like it? Mine won’t take me back. Do you think if I touched the one the dolphins found it would send me back home?
I mean. I normally just file things so I don’t really know. But let’s try it anyway! I’ll take you to where they have it.
